name: detachedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not show any emotional involvement or interest in a situation: He stared detachedly at the crowd that had gathered. The pilots detachedly observe the tiny sparks far below them like flashes of a mirror.
More examplesFewer examplesShe wondered detachedly what the reaction would be if she voiced her unspoken thoughts aloud.For her, music was not the sort of thing one judged, detachedly. He sat looking out of the window, gazing detachedly into the distance.
